name: Unveloped
description: Join Anton and Garlo as they travel across the land to stop Angor, a black fairy who develops really bad games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista (32bit) Service Pack 2 Processor: Intel​ ​Pentium​ ​4, AMD Athlon​ ​64 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia​ ​Geforce​ ​/​ ​ATI​ ​Radeon​ ​128MB Storage: 32 MB available space Additional Notes: May lag
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows​ ​10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel​ ​Core​ ​i3,​ ​AMD​ ​Ryzen​ ​3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia​ ​Geforce​ ​GTX​ ​/​ ​ATI​ ​Radeon​ ​1GB Storage: 32 MB available space Additional Notes: May run at 60fps
